name: Goobers - GMTK2020 Jam game
description:
This is Goobers, a prototype/game I have made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Unfortunately I only had about 8-9 hours to make a game for this jam so I did what I could, sorry there is no audio etc.

The goal of the game is to make friends with the Goobers by giving them the things they are looking for. Things just get a bit out of hand as time  goes on.

Big warning, this isn't a very good game.

--Controls-- 

Walk - Arrow Keys

Pick up - Z

Give - X

Speed up time - Space

Quit - Escape
